TopicTitle: My airplane only rolls right even when i try to roll left.

Articles.Content: so i'm using a xbox 1 s and I've been building many planes. On some of these planes when i try to roll to the left, it rolls me to the right and even if i roll to the right it goes to the right. Any solutions?
Screenshots of the craft in question usually help with diagnoses. Also, welcome to the forum.

I had this on the ps4/5, for me it was because I was in precision mode (light blue sliders and that appears to be borked on console, if you are,  switch back to normal control mode (brown sliders) and if need be dial down the control authority on the control surfaces to compensate for the more aggressive reaction of the controls.

On 11/28/2020 at 4:37 PM, helpmepls said:

so i'm using a xbox 1 s and I've been building many planes. On some of these planes when i try to roll to the left, it rolls me to the right and even if i roll to the right it goes to the right. Any solutions?

Asymetric control surfaces could be one problem, the control surfaces being upside down could be some of the problems. It doesn't sound like a trim issue, but nontheless, try to fine trim the plane using RB+LS in the roll direction. These all may help. Love the username, very unique.
thank you everyone i will try to fix it
